content: It is costing the tax payer a bundle for him to stumble around his middle of the road golf courses…bawdy resorts… Obama's travel expenses were $97m over eight years. Trump is already at $23m after 10 weeksDonald Trump's trips to his luxury Florida resort have already cost the US taxpayer at least $24 million (£19.2 million…www.independent.co.uk Such scum bag….
